journal.text: Sketched new layout ideas for the Hub grid; kept the asymmetry intentional.
Refined pagination styling. Small type, uppercase labels.
Rough draft of Issue Zero. Mapped color tokens to information, not decoration.
Explored integrating GLSL for subtle atmospheric effects (future).
Defined the lexicon: archive, translate, pattern, system, layer, cosmic, memory, signal.
Set brand variables in CSS. Tightened line-heights and margins.
